MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the SY4 postcode area of Wem, affecting properties in Park Road and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 8:29PM. We are aware of the previous power cuts affecting your area and we apologise for this. Our engineers are on their way to the area to investigate and repair the fault. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible. We expect the power to be restored by 11:30PM. Once they arrive, or when we receive any update regarding the cause, we will update this message. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8:44PM on 11th January 2021
